description.translate: Be worthy of its courage, cause it has seen hard times and worse.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Torse du gardien\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Soyez digne de son courage,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car il en vit des rudes et des pires encore.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Be worthy of its courage, cause it\"}","{\"text\":\"§7has seen hard times and worse.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a1 §7SPD§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
